div.div: Our Mission It is the mission of the Tehama County Department of Education to provide a world-class education for all students from early childhood to adulthood.

div.p: View Superintendent of Schools Rich DuVarney's message on our strong educational system and committed educators.
The Human Resource Services staff provides accessible, accurate and timely services to TCDE employees and school districts.

h3.img: Our Future in FocusTop of Page

div.p: The focus of the ESS Department is to support our fourteen districts through high quality and sustainable professional learning.
